refnamediv.refpurpose: Get all the categories on the same level with the current one.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns an array listing all categories of the same level as the current category in the categories tree. agent is the agent identifier returned by a previous call to >udm_alloc_agent.
The function can be useful for developing categories tree browser.
The returnded array consists of pairs. Elements with even index numbers contain the category paths, odd elements contain the corresponding category names.
refsect1.screen: $array[0] will contain '020300' $array[1] will contain 'Audi' $array[2] will contain '020301' $array[3] will contain 'BMW' $array[4] will contain '020302' $array[5] will contain 'Opel' ... etc.
